item.title: Pnpc help pleasE!
item.dc:creator: @FLIPPER182 FLIPPER182
item.description:
@FLIPPER182 wrote:

can someone tell me whats wrong with my ::pnpc? it wont work…}else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); }
